page.title: 05CHELFORD CATTLE MARKET
page.content: Livestock sales take place every Monday and every Thursday. This is the most important aspect of the market. We made our visit on a Monday morning. Selling started at 9.00am and finished at 2.00pm. There were ten classes as follows:- calves,eggs,weanlings,poultry,dairy cattle,butcher's cattle,produce sundries,store sheep and goats, and vegetables and plants. All the sales are by auction. Local people bring the animals by truck and by train. The majority of buyers are also local. { Sale of Animals.}This takes place in rings. The auctionneer is in a box overlooking the ring into which animals are brought individually. The buyers stand round the outside or sit on terraced seats. (continued on next page)
